website_summaries.verdict: This is a well-rounded and decent-looking fridge that you might be able to find at a discount as newer models start rolling in.
pros: This four-door French door model doesn't have any glaring weak spots, and also sports one of the best adjustable-temp drawers we've ever tested
cons: Performance was just OK, with temperatures consistently running a few degrees warmer than the target in our tests
The ice maker also blocks off one of the in-door shelves

customer_reviews.title: I would expect better from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator works ok. But JUST ok. Space is not laid out very well. It has a lot of cubic feet, but oddly shaped shelving and door compartments left us scratching our heads wondering what the designers were thinking. The 10 year major component warranty is deceptive too. The icemaker crapped out after just over one year, but is not considered a MAJOR component. After doing research it seems this is a common problem for Samsung units. I would expect better from Samsung...
customer_reviews.author: terrelliott

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, large and nice features, but ice maker freezes constantly and after multiple service calls while under warranty (bought 4 year...so glad!), we still have the refrigerator freeze up in the back, which freezes up the fan, so cool air can't circulate and food goes bad. Screen indicates temperature is fine, but chunky milk indicates, it's not. Main board was replaced, brand new ice maker unit, along with other "fixes," but to no avail. After happily owning Samsung Televisions and phones, exceedingly disappointed with this and will never buy another Samsung refrigerator again! Read so many poor reviews since experiencing these issues. Now that I'm out of warranty, I'm not going to pour more money into this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Willyd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ice maker didn't work when I finally opened the box and used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and huge!
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing. However I found that in the left door (the one that has the ice machine on it) it is a little bit worthless. The shelves are tiny. I use it for certain sauces and dressings. But don't expect to get a lot from it. Also , in our household,the middle door (the one above the freezer) is not as functional as we will like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: YRRB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality for every day use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the separate deli door which lessens constant opening and closing of refrigerator. Thought I might miss the second ice holder in the freezer from previous model, but I have not. Like the separate buttons for water and ice. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Is someone know how can I easily remove them daily would be very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Only issue with this appliance is the finger print in the doors. Is someone know how can I easily remove them daily would be very helpful. The ice dispenser is very slow and the capacity is fairly low for more than 10 people. I am very glad with the service, the operation, how it looks and the space it has inside in each of the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Milangela Díaz

customer_reviews.title: great fridge but shipping was a letdown.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fridge and it's exactly what I wanted. However the shipping was A super letdown. Took over a month from the order date to delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B

customer_reviews.title: otherwise very nice
customer_reviews.text: had a scratch on front lower panel, otherwise very nice unit
customer_reviews.author: B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this beautiful fridge and the delivery was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Have It for a Couple of Weeks But It Is Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this fridge for a couples of weeks in the house but so far, it is living to the expectations created around it. It is whisper quiet, easy to setup and connect and exactly as described by the manufacturer/seller. I have not experienced any of the negative aspects mentioned by some of the reviewers I checked before placing the order. The diemensions on the specs were right on target (as we had a tight fit among our kitchen cabinets. I will share any updates in a few months to confirm the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P

customer_reviews.title: Behemoth is Tough to Get in the House
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was into the garage, so it was quite the job getting it into the house. I was able to fashion a ramp from 5/8" plywood I had lying around. It was worth the savings on price vs the big box retailers in the area. Love the extra drawer. UPDATE: don't but this. Ice maker freezes up. Picture is 2 weeks after I thawed it out. Once it goes bad, it stays bad. I just put in a ticket, but I hear SAMSUNG service is painful, but it should be under the 5-year sealed system warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smole

customer_reviews.title: I love the fridg but the shipper used only drops curb ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fridg but the shipper used only drops curb side you'll need a couple of friends and a dolly to get in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water all over the floor and customer support is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this frig at Home Depot, but still stay away from this frig. The tech has been out to the house three times and can't fix the water leaking out of the freezer part. Plus the ice machine still doesn't work. The samsung tech support has been nothing but close to worthless, when you call them they ask you the same question over and over again. Please don't buy Samsung, buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mullins

customer_reviews.title: entire cooling system is defective
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has a serious issue with the coils in the refrigerator icing up and stopping the fan. The defrost system they have is inadequate even when working properly. If you buy this plan on spending a lot of time emptying out and removing the inside back panel to defrost with a hair dryer. I rigged a terrarium heater into it and that reduced the need to do this from once every 6 weeks to about 3 times a year. This product should have been recalled it is so bad. Just search Samsung refrigerator defrost issue and you will see. I will never buy another Samsung appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Breaks constantly
customer_reviews.text: Faulty and constantly broken This fridge has broken 5 times since we bought in at the end of 2015. The twin cooling feature is absolutely terrible. Constantly malfunctioning and requiring maintenance. No new features or additional parts has been a successful remedy. I'm waiting for best buy to determine it's a wasted case so I can my money back and never buy another Samsung product again. I wish I could rate this lower. So angry about the waste of time money and food. Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: brittanykh35

customer_reviews.title: Samsung should stick to TVs and Consumer Electronics
customer_reviews.text: This fridge looks nice. It worked for 3 years - until it didn't. The fan gave out along with the ice maker. $90 to have a Samsung technician look at it. He quoted $700 to fix it. Perhaps I've been lucky with the refrigerators I've purchased but I've never had one give out on me in less than 15 years. This top of the line fridge requires a new fan in 3 (with a $700 repair bill)? No thanks. No more Samsung appliances for me. I'm going to assume this isn't a coincidence. Search the web for Samsung appliances and you'll see some real horror stories. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Highschoolrival

customer_reviews.title: Busted ice maker, noisy fan
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker stopped working after a couple of years; repairman made a few mods that helped it along for a few more months. Now the fan is rattling so badly it's driving me crazy. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dillen

customer_reviews.title: If a picture is worth a $thousand word, then a video must be worth $millions!
customer_reviews.text: I think the pictures can tell you better than I can. The tech has fixed this contraption 6 times. Looks trendy, holds very little product, noisy, ice dispenser breaks every year if you use crushed setting, when you put food in the freezer it goes off balance and ices up to create this constant mess you have to hammer every month because you spent $3500 on top of the line Samsung, and you keep spending on the overpriced water filters.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Run away.
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker started freezing up two months out of warranty. Within a couple months it quit completely. Come to find out, there is a significant design defect with the thermostats (the ice maker is in the fridge compartment) and this is a common problem. The service tech told us that they will not warranty a replacement kit for more than 90 days because they have seen many of those fail as well (at a cost of $500 in parts and labor). I am working to join one of the class actions by the many people who paid close to $2K for a worthless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Dave

customer_reviews.title: Defective icemakers Look up class action lawsuit
customer_reviews.text: Every single Samsung freezer is defective. They may work for a year, maybe two but from there on out you will have nothing but heartache and spend money to chase problems that are never fixed. Ours stopped making ice after only a year. We replaced the icemaker twice now. Still having the same problems. It leaked water and ruined our cabinets. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: James A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worst Refrigerator Ever
customer_reviews.text: With in the first two years the compressor went they tried to fix it five times and couldn't so they replaced the entire refrigerator. After 18 months the icemaker broke after five times trying to fix it they replaced the entire refrigerator again . Within two weeks The third one started making a humming sound service has been out twice. They have replace the evaporator fan and that did not fix it. They have ordered another fan part we will see if they can fix it this time. Ready to ask for A different brand refrigerator. Don't buy one of these
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker is crap
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator itself is OK, but the icemaker is total crap. After about a year of owning this appliance, the icemaker freezes up and after defrosting, a week later freezes up again. I got tired of defrosting and it freezing up again so I turned it off. Will not purchase another Samsung refrigerator again!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Useless Junk
customer_reviews.text: Constant frost build up in the freezer area. Constantly need to chip it off with a hammer and screw driver. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: True North

customer_reviews.title: Worst refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase this refrigerator through this seller so I cannot say anything against them however I did but this fridge and it is horrible. I will never buy a Samsung appliance again. We started having cooling issues with the fridge within just a few months after purchase and good luck with Samsung customer service because you won’t get any!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Fridge Only Last 5 Years!
customer_reviews.text: Ran great for 5 years (bought in 2015) then out of the blue everything started failing. Top ice maker froze up multiple times no matter how many time I defrosted it. Then it just stop working. Now the coils are freezing up and the built up ice is hitting the cooler fan and just making all kinds of terrible noise. Defrosted a few times with a hair dryer but it just keeps doing it. Very annoyed. This fridge was not meant for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spender

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: We have had a problem a month with this Samsung fridge. Mainly with the icemaker, water line/dispenser, and filters. It has flooded, it has clogged, and done everything else imaginable. I'm never buying another Samsung fridge again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Ever Buy a Samsung Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker freezes up. I’ve finally given up on it entirely after four years of wrestling with it and bought a countertop ice maker. Ridiculous especially given how much I paid for this refrigerator. I’m also not convinced it’s cooling properly. I will never buy a Samsung fridge again.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but very poorly laid out inside which makes for a lot of wasted space. The ice maker is horrible and always freezes over, which causes it to stop completely. We have called Samsung so many times and they always charge to fix it. They know about the issue (google it) but will not do anything to stand by thier product. Also, the water dispenser always drips causing water drops down the front. I am so sad we purchased this and will never ever buy anything with the name Samsung on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Daniels

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS FRIDGE
customer_reviews.text: Owned this fridge for 5 years. Worked great for 4. Then the compressor went out. Was under warranty so although it took time and patience, they replaced it. Broke again, twice. They said if it broke a 4th time, they would replace the fridge. That compressor lasted about 6 months. Just long enough for the extended warranty to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roussos

customer_reviews.title: Poor ICE Maker
customer_reviews.text: After two years Ice Maker quit working. It seemed to always give problems. First year of ownership, 3 trips by service personnel. Ice maker kept getting stuck (not enough clearance in freezer) trying to eject ice. Now just doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bob

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 year ago and ice maker froze up. Twin cooling in fridge froze as well cost me 500 to repair. Class action suit pending so please dont waste your money. LGs are horrible to according to repairman.
customer_reviews.author: William Travis

customer_reviews.title: Junk to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. Cheaply made. Seals around door failed within two years. Ice maker problems also experienced like so many other people. Nice lighting but junk.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Freezer issues
customer_reviews.text: We are currently working with samsung to resolve a freezer issue. Not sure if it will be resolved or not. Door does not shut all the way frequently due to poor design of sliding shelf. However I really like everything else:/. Middle drawer is awesome and it's the only one we found where you can open produce drawers inside without opening both doors.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Malsbury

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this refrigerator! You can't find anything in the bottom freezer as things get stacked on top of things. The ice maker is a night mare! When it drops ice it sounds like a bomb. It gets stopped up and you have to clear the ice out of the drop hole frequently. When you want ice and push the thing to give you ice there is a delay like its is thinking about whether to give you ice or not. I hate this frige. Samsung should stick to making Tv's!
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: I thought Samsung was good quality.  Instead it is just CHEAP quality at high prices
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker stopped working 1 year after purchase. Only remedy is full replacement. Freezer door handle came off plastic and cheap parts with prices like $8 for a screw to fix it. BUY another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gigharbori

customer_reviews.title: Worst appliance purchase I have made
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker will constantly freeze over. Inside the back panel will turn into a block of ice freezing up the fan. Very expensive for an appliance that lasts four years (or less). Save yourself the hassle and money and roll the dice on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Anne

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting! Samsung,  stick to electronics
customer_reviews.text: When i have to use a hair dryer every 2 weeks to ensure ice drops but water drops daily where mold grows then there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator has to be the WORST refrigerator I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator has to be the WORST refrigerator I have ever owned!! I bought it at home depot, not on amazon just so you know. First it is the noisiest ice cub maker you ever heard and it only makes 91 ice cubes in a 24 hour period. On top of that at night you can hear it running, the motor. No, there is nothing wrong with it, I had warrenty come out and the guy told me everyone has the same issues with this refrigerator. It is way over priced for its functions.
customer_reviews.author: jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this fridge
customer_reviews.text: I've had this refrigerator for approx. 6 months and I love it. The lighting is great, lots of space. Mine is quiet, have no complaints there. Looks great. I did a lot of research and it was between this and the LG with the hidden door compartment. I chose this because the doors close much smoother. Also, the freezer opened/closed easier than any I looked at. The only thing I would change is the ice maker doesn't produce ice as quickly into my cup as I would like. But not a huge deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator from Samsung stopped working three months after delivery. The design has too many flaws and the compressor suddenly wear out. I would never recommend this refrigerator to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: judd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Fridge at Lowes. It is AMAZING!! The water filter is great and makes perfectly filtered ice and water. The middle drawer is key. I'm not sure how I lived life without it before. The interior is well lit and spacious. I highly recommend this to anyone. I did heed to the bad reviews about Samsung customer service however, and purchased a Lowe's 5 year extended plan.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Clark

customer_reviews.title: Noisy ...Then QUIT WORKING! 😱
customer_reviews.text: Noisy ...Then QUIT WORKING after 2 months! We are sending it back for a nice, quiet Kitchen Aide like our friends bought. Aside from it stopping, it was a nice refrigerator, we liked the middle drawer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Means

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful of Samsung refrigerators. I had one ...
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful of Samsung refrigerators. I had one and one week later it is failing. It took a lot of effort to get Samsung to agree there was a problem. Here is a link to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Field Medic

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is awesome. The manuals stink but everything is so well ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item from Amazon and installed it myself with no issues. It is so much quieter and efficient than my old GE Profile unit (now a beer fridge). All I can say is awesome. The manuals stink but everything is so well engineered it almost makes installing and using a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Linville

customer_reviews.title: I will never spend money like this on a samsung product again
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has no quality controls, were a hard working family that refitted our house with this refrigerator, a samsung tv and two of this companies washers and dryers. We have had nothing but problems with all 4. The refrigerators shelving is constantly breaking ( after holding minimal weight). We have now replaced the shelving and drawers 4 times. I will never spend money like this on a samsung product again. The customer service is horrific as well. The CEO last year made 4.25 million on making products that don't work and by never replacing anything for free.
customer_reviews.author: flora gibson

product_meta.title: Samsung RF28HMEDBSR/AA 28 cu. ft. 4-Door French Door Refrige
product_meta.description: 28 cu. ft. French Door Refrigerator Ultra-Large Capacity FlexZone Drawer Tempered Glass Spill-Proof Shelves External Filtered Water/Ice Dispenser
feature_bullets: FlexZone Drawer Optimized For Family Organization
Twin Cooling Plus Maintains Fridge Humidity And A Dry Freezer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.2 out of 5 stars71 ratings2.2 out of 5 stars
